message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today for $14,000. I believe it offers a great deal of value and would be a beneficial addition for you.
I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to save some money on this product. I'm willing to pay $10,000 for it. Can you meet me halfway?

Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand you're looking for a good deal.  While I can't go as low as $10,000, I could come down to $13,000. I'm confident this product will exceed your expectations and provide significant value.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $11,500 for the product. Can you meet me halfway again?
